actions.recommendation: The ringing in your ears & occasional headaches are likely due to episodes of higher blood pressure. Your blood pressure readings have been high on multiple occasions. This can be controlled with medication & the lifestyle changes we discussed.
Stress also has a negative impact.
Your high blood pressure is the main area that needs intervention & control.
Regular Prostate screening helps detect any abnormalities early & improves management outcomes. This can be done with PSA blood tests & a clinical examination.

Controlling your current chronic conditions (hypertension & cholesterol) with medication & the lifestyle changes discussed is essential to preventing future cardiovascular events. Avoiding smoking/ alcohol is recommended due to the impact seen on your investigations.
Making these changes will have a big impact on your health.
